tonic.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a clear bitter-tasting drink that you can mix with alcoholic drinks such as gin or vodka
tonic.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She sat and sipped a gin and tonic.
tonic.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a drink that you have as a medicine to give you more energy or strength when you feel tired
tonic.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: A lot of people need a tonic at the end of the winter.
tonic.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: something that makes you feel happy and full of energy
tonic.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: A weekend by the sea was the perfect tonic.
tonic.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a liquid that you put on your hair or skin to improve it and make it more healthy
tonic.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: the first note in a musical scale of eight notes
